metadata.title: CVE-2022-23318 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A heap-buffer-overflow in pcf2bdf, versions >= 1.05 allows an attacker totrigger unsafe memory access via a specially crafted PCF font file. Thisout-of-bound read may lead to an application crash, information disclosurevia program memory or other context-dependent impact.

criterions.comment: pcf2bdf package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
